Articles.Content: i have been trying different ideas in ksp, and i decided to make a huge dump truck for the cart plugin, all well and good been modeling it for the past few hours, i finally tried to put it in the game, just copied a basic cart config and changed the essentials for the first test, and i get an error that just says too many polys and just a continuing line of sending Alt key to application there\'s an attached pic of the alt f2 debug log thingy. i understand(i think) the too many polys bit, im just wondering the send alt key up to application, and i thought the game didn\'t have a polygon limit.

Can\'t help you with the alt-key thing, but why would you think KSP does not have a poly limit?

Everything has a limit. Most KSP parts are just a few 100 polys.

That alt key message comes from switching to/from KSP and is harmless.

How many polys does your model have? Could you try to optimize it a bit?
